name: 3dAmpToRSFC
author: AFNI Developers
description: Convert spectral amplitudes into standard RSFC parameters.

inputs.description: Input file of one-sided spectral amplitudes, such as output by 3dLombScargle.
inputs.name: Input Amplitudes

inputs.description: Input file of a one-sided power spectrum, such as output by 3dLombScargle.
inputs.name: Input Power Spectrum

inputs.description: Output file prefix; file names will be: PREFIX_ALFF, PREFIX_FALFF, etc.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Lower and upper boundaries of the low frequency fluctuations (LFFs), within the interval [FBOT, FTOP].
inputs.name: Frequency Band

inputs.description: Volume mask of voxels to include for calculations.
inputs.name: Mask

output-files.description: Amplitude of low frequency fluctuations (L1 sum).
output-files.name: ALFF Output

output-files.description: ALFF divided by the mean value within the input/estimated whole brain mask (mean-scaled ALFF).
output-files.name: mALFF Output

output-files.description: ALFF divided by sum of full amplitude spectrum (fractional ALFF).
output-files.name: fALFF Output

output-files.description: Square-root of summed square of low frequency fluctuations (L2 sum).
output-files.name: RSFA Output

output-files.description: RSFA divided by the mean value within the input/estimated whole brain mask (mean-scaled RSFA).
output-files.name: mRSFA Output

output-files.description: ALFF divided by sum of full amplitude spectrum (fractional RSFA).
output-files.name: fRSFA Output
